About the demos
1 - Make sure you install Computer Vision System Toolbox in Matlab to use Viola-Jones face detector. 
2 - 'Demo' displays the alignment algorithm in MRLR, including MRLR1 and MRLR2.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
When using the code in your research work, you should cite the following paper:

Efficient Face Alignment via Locality-constrained Representation for Robust Recognition,
Yandong Wen*, Weiyang Liu*, Meng Yang, Zhifeng Li (* indicates equal contributions)
Available at: http://arxiv.org/abs/1507.07073
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For any problem about the codes, please contact to {wen.yandong@mail.scut.edu.cn} & {wyliu@pku.edu.cn}
description: Matlab code for the paper <Misalignment-robust Face Recognition via Efficient Locality-constrained Representation>
